      Tab in which the questioning is done.

      TextField in which the current question gets written.

      ProgressBar which displays the error rate of the current vocab.

      Label which displays the error rate percentage of the current vocab.
      private javafx.scene.control.Slider rightToReset
      Slider to select how many right answers in a row the user should have to provide to reset one vocabs failure rate.
      private javafx.scene.text.TextFlow textflow
      TextFlow in which the from VocabManager.getFormattedCorrection(String) formatted Text objects will get displayed.

      An instance of VocabManager.

    • Field Detail

      • questionTextField

        private javafx.scene.control.TextField questionTextField
        TextField in which the current question gets written.

      • answerTextField

        private javafx.scene.control.TextField answerTextField
        TextField in which the user can enter his answer.

      • textflow

        private javafx.scene.text.TextFlow textflow
        TextFlow in which the from VocabManager.getFormattedCorrection(String) formatted Text objects will get displayed.

      • questionEnterTextField

        private javafx.scene.control.TextField questionEnterTextField
        TextField in which the user can enter the question when adding a vocab.

      • answerEnterTextField

        private javafx.scene.control.TextField answerEnterTextField
        TextField in which the user can enter the answer when adding a vocab.

      • rate

        private javafx.scene.control.ProgressBar rate
        ProgressBar which displays the error rate of the current vocab. See Vocab.getWrongRate().

      • rateLabel

        private javafx.scene.control.Label rateLabel
        Label which displays the error rate percentage of the current vocab. See Vocab.getWrongRate().

      • askInvertedCheckBox

        private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox askInvertedCheckBox
        CheckBox to determine whether or not to switch question and answers. Sets VocabManager.askInverted through saveSettings(Event).

      • caseSensitiveCheckBox

        private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox caseSensitiveCheckBox
        CheckBox to determine whether or not to check case sensitive. Sets VocabManager.askInverted through saveSettings(Event).

      • maxTriesSlider

        private javafx.scene.control.Slider maxTriesSlider
        Slider to select how many tries the user should have on one vocab until the next one is selected. Sets VocabManager.maxTries through saveSettings(Event).

      • rightToReset

        private javafx.scene.control.Slider rightToReset
        Slider to select how many right answers in a row the user should have to provide to reset one vocabs failure rate. Sets VocabManager.rightAmountToReset through saveSettings(Event).

      • questioningTab

        private javafx.scene.control.Tab questioningTab
        Tab in which the questioning is done. Is disabled if no vocabs are available (See VocabManager.isReady()).

      • vocabManager

        private VocabManager vocabManager
        An instance of VocabManager.
